description: hoopla puts your public library at your fingertips. Anytime. Everywhere!
everyone_listening: We've got what everyone's listening to
bestsellers_new_releases: Bestsellers. New releases. That story you've been waiting for.
business_non_fiction_literature: Business and non-fiction literature from the publishers 'Mann, Ivanov and Ferber', 'Alpina Publisher', 'Olymp-Business' and others.
audiobooks_for_everyone: From epic stories to self-improvement, there are audiobooks for everyone.
science_fiction_desc: Dive into futuristic and otherworldly adventures.
thriller_desc: Get lost in suspenseful and gripping narratives.
fantasy_desc: Unveil magical worlds and epic quests.
mystery_desc: Solve intriguing puzzles and uncover secrets.
biography_desc: Learn about the lives of extraordinary people.
historical_fiction_desc: Travel back in time with captivating stories.
adventure_desc: Embark on thrilling journeys and quests.
self_help_desc: Find inspiration and guidance for personal growth.
newAudibleSubscribersOffer: New Audible subscribers get 2 free audiobooks with trial
pickOneBookDescription: Choose from our wide selection of genres and download a free eBook every month.
thousandsOfTitlesDescription: Browse our extensive library with thousands of free books available to download.
exclusiveDealsDescription: Get exclusive deals and offers on premium books available for a limited time.
